name: Step & Action (64x64)
description:
Step &Action is a game made during #LowRezJam

Dig and fight enemies as you try to  escape the void. Loot minerals and buy items from the shop.  Levels are randomized.

How to Play

  • Player can do action any time. (Circle or X)
  • Enemies move during Circle only.
  • Spending all actions will move the void closer to a player.

Controls

  • Move by arrow keys or WASD
  • To attack enemy or wall,  simply move against it.
  • Pause ESC

Game will be updated later after LowRezJam!
